easy-search.name: approvalBizElement
easy-search.sql: select id, code, name, kind_id, data_source_config, sequence from wf_approvalelement where kind_id = 2 order by sequence

easy-search.name: procApprovalElement
easy-search.sql: select id, code, name, kind_id, data_source_config, sequence from (select id, code, name, kind_id,data_source_config, sequence from wf_approvalelement where kind_id = 1 union select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.kind_id, t.data_source_config, t.sequence from wf_approvalelement t, wf_procapprovalelement p, wf_procdef d where t.id = p.element_id and p.proc_id = d.id and d.proc_id = :procKey and d.code = :procUnitId ) order by sequence

easy-search.name: approvalHandlerKind
easy-search.sql: select id, code, name, data_source_id, data_source_config, sequence from wf_approvalHandlerKind order by sequence

easy-search.name: bindProc
easy-search.sql: select arp.id_ as id, arp.rev_ as rev, arp.category_ as category, arp.name_ as name, arp.key_ as key, arp.deployment_id_ as deployment_id, arp.resource_name_ as resource_name, arp.dgrm_resource_name_ as dgrm_resource_name, arp.description_ as description, arp.has_start_form_key_ as has_start_form_key, arp.suspension_state_ as suspension_state, arp.tenant_id_ as tenant_id from act_re_procdef arp where arp.key_ not in (select proc_id from wf_procdef where proc_id is not null)

easy-search.name: procIds
easy-search.sql: select t.name, t.proc_id from Wf_Procdef t where t.node_kind_id = 'proc'
